responses.input: BTech Computer Science me kaun kaun se subjects hote hain?

Data Structures ek tarika hai jisme hum data ko efficiently store aur organize karte hain, jaise Array, Linked List, Stack, Queue, Graph, aur Tree.
Algorithm ek step-by-step process hota hai jo kisi problem ko solve karne ke liye use kiya jata hai.

responses.input: DBMS ka full form kya hota hai?
responses.reply: DBMS ka full form 'Database Management System' hota hai, jo data ko manage aur store karne ka ek system hai.

responses.input: Operating System ka main kaam kya hota hai?
responses.reply: Operating System computer hardware aur software ke beech ek interface provide karta hai. Jaise Windows, Linux, MacOS.

responses.input: Networking me TCP/IP model kya hota hai?
responses.reply: TCP/IP model ek standard networking model hai jo communication ko 4 layers me divide karta hai: Application, Transport, Internet, aur Network Interface.
Cloud Computing ek technology hai jisme hum remotely internet ke through computing services le sakte hain, jaise AWS, Azure, aur Google Cloud.
Cybersecurity systems aur networks ko hacking, malware, aur unauthorized access se bachane me madad karti hai.

responses.input: Machine Learning aur AI me kya difference hai?
responses.reply: AI ek broad field hai jo machines ko intelligent banata hai, jabki Machine Learning ek AI ka subset hai jo data se seekhne par focus karta hai.
DevOps ek methodology hai jo Development aur Operations teams ke beech automation aur collaboration improve karta hai.

responses.input: Git aur GitHub me kya difference hai?
responses.reply: Git ek version control system hai jo code ko track karta hai, aur GitHub ek platform hai jaha developers Git repositories ko manage aur share kar sakte hain.

responses.input: DSA ka full form kya hota hai?
responses.reply: DSA ka full form 'Data Structures and Algorithms' hota hai, jo competitive programming aur software development me bahut zaroori hai.
Python simple syntax aur readability ke wajah se popular hai. Iska use AI, ML, Web Development, aur Automation me hota hai.
OOPs ka matlab 'Object-Oriented Programming' hai, jo real-world objects ko code me represent karne ka tarika hai. Jaise: Class, Object, Inheritance, Polymorphism.

responses.input: SQL aur NoSQL me kya difference hai?
responses.reply: SQL relational databases ke liye use hota hai (jaise MySQL, PostgreSQL), jabki NoSQL non-relational data ke liye hota hai (jaise MongoDB, Cassandra).

responses.input: BTech ke baad kaun kaun se job roles mil sakte hain?
responses.reply: BTech ke baad Software Engineer, DevOps Engineer, Cybersecurity Analyst, Data Scientist, Cloud Engineer, AI/ML Engineer, aur Full-Stack Developer jaise jobs mil sakti hain.

responses.input: AI aur ML ke best projects kaunse hain?
responses.reply: AI/ML projects jaise Chatbot, Image Recognition, Sentiment Analysis, Fake News Detection, aur Stock Price Prediction kaafi popular hain.

responses.input: Full-Stack Developer banne ke liye kya seekhna padega?
responses.reply: Full-Stack Developer ke liye HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js (Frontend), Node.js, Express.js (Backend), aur MongoDB ya MySQL (Database) seekhna zaroori hai.

responses.input: Cloud Computing ka best certification kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Azure Fundamentals, aur Google Cloud Associate Engineer best certifications hain.

responses.input: DSA seekhne ke liye best platform kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: LeetCode, CodeChef, GeeksforGeeks, aur HackerRank best platforms hain DSA practice karne ke liye.

responses.input: Kubernetes aur Docker ka kya use hai?
responses.reply: Docker ek containerization tool hai jo applications ko isolated environment me run karta hai, aur Kubernetes ek orchestration tool hai jo multiple containers ko efficiently manage karta hai.
Penetration Testing ek ethical hacking process hai jo vulnerabilities detect karne ke liye hoti hai.
Blockchain ek decentralized ledger system hai jo transactions ko secure aur immutable banata hai. Jaise: Bitcoin, Ethereum.

responses.input: Web Development ke liye best programming languages kaunsi hain?
responses.reply: Web Development ke liye HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python (Django), aur Node.js best hain.

responses.input: DSA me recursion kya hota hai?
responses.reply: Recursion ek technique hai jisme function khud ko call karta hai jab tak base case mil nahi jata.

responses.input: Computer Networks me subnetting kya hoti hai?
responses.reply: Subnetting ek technique hai jo ek large network ko chhote networks me divide karne ke liye use hoti hai, taaki IP address efficiently allocate ho sake.

responses.input: Computer Science students ke liye best open-source projects kaunse hain?
responses.reply: React, TensorFlow, Linux Kernel, Mozilla Firefox, aur Kubernetes jaise open-source projects contribute karne ke liye best hain.

responses.input: Machine Learning model ka accuracy kaise improve karein?
responses.reply: Feature Engineering, Hyperparameter Tuning, Data Augmentation, aur Ensemble Learning se ML model ka accuracy improve kiya ja sakta hai.

responses.input: Cybersecurity me hashing kya hota hai?
responses.reply: Hashing ek process hai jo data ko fixed-length ke unique code me convert karta hai. Jaise: MD5, SHA-256.

responses.input: Bharat ka rashtriya pashu kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Bharat ka rashtriya pashu 'Royal Bengal Tiger' hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka rashtriya pakshi kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Bharat ka rashtriya pakshi 'Mor' hai.

responses.input: Bharat ki rashtriya bhasha kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Bharat ki koi ek rashtriya bhasha nahi hai, lekin Hindi aur English official languages hain.

responses.input: Bharat ki sabse lambi nadi kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Bharat ki sabse lambi nadi 'Ganga' hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka sabse bada rajya kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Rajasthan Bharat ka sabse bada rajya hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka sabse chhota rajya kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Goa Bharat ka sabse chhota rajya hai.

responses.input: Bharat ke pehle pradhan mantri kaun the?
responses.reply: Bharat ke pehle pradhan mantri 'Jawaharlal Nehru' the.

responses.input: Bharat ke pehle rashtrapati kaun the?
responses.reply: Bharat ke pehle rashtrapati 'Dr. Rajendra Prasad' the.

responses.input: Bharat ki sabse unchi choti kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Kangchenjunga Bharat ki sabse unchi choti hai.

responses.input: Vishwa ka sabse bada mahasagar kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Vishwa ka sabse bada mahasagar 'Prashant Mahasagar' (Pacific Ocean) hai.

responses.input: Vishwa ka sabse bada desh kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Vishwa ka sabse bada desh 'Russia' hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse chhota desh kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Duniya ka sabse chhota desh 'Vatican City' hai.

responses.input: Duniya ki sabse oonchi imarat kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Burj Khalifa duniya ki sabse oonchi imarat hai.

responses.input: Duniya ki sabse purani bhasha kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Tamil duniya ki sabse purani boli jane wali bhasha hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse thanda sthal kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Antarctica duniya ka sabse thanda sthal hai.

responses.input: Bharat ki sabse badi jheel kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Wular Lake Bharat ki sabse badi jheel hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka rashtriya phool kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Bharat ka rashtriya phool 'Kamal' hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka rashtriya vriksh kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Bharat ka rashtriya vriksh 'Bargad' (Banyan tree) hai.
Rashtrapati Bhavan New Delhi me sthit hai.

responses.input: Bharat me kul kitne rajya hain?
responses.reply: Bharat me kul 28 rajya aur 8 kendrashasit pradesh hain.
Ramayan Maharishi Valmiki ne likhi thi.
Mahabharat Maharishi Ved Vyas ne likhi thi.

responses.input: Bharat ka sabse bada bandargah kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust (JNPT), Mumbai Bharat ka sabse bada bandargah hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse bada railway network kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Duniya ka sabse bada railway network 'United States' me hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse bada stadium kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad duniya ka sabse bada cricket stadium hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka pehla antariksh yatri kaun tha?
responses.reply: Rakesh Sharma Bharat ka pehla antariksh yatri tha.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse garam sthal kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Death Valley, California duniya ka sabse garam sthal maana jata hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse bada jungle kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Amazon Rainforest duniya ka sabse bada jungle hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse lamba railway route kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Trans-Siberian Railway, Russia duniya ka sabse lamba railway route hai.

responses.input: Duniya ki sabse badi masjid kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Al-Masjid Al-Haram, Makkah duniya ki sabse badi masjid hai.

responses.input: Bharat ki sabse purani university kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Nalanda University Bharat ki sabse purani university hai.

responses.input: Bharat ki sabse lambi surang kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Atal Tunnel, Himachal Pradesh Bharat ki sabse lambi surang hai.

responses.input: Bharat me pehla metro rail system kahan shuru hua tha?
responses.reply: Bharat me pehla metro rail system Kolkata me shuru hua tha.

responses.input: Duniya ki sabse unchi waterfall kaunsi hai?
responses.reply: Angel Falls, Venezuela duniya ki sabse unchi waterfall hai.

responses.input: Sabse pehla Nobel Prize kab diya gaya tha?
responses.reply: Sabse pehla Nobel Prize 1901 me diya gaya tha.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse purana stock exchange kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Amsterdam Stock Exchange duniya ka sabse purana stock exchange hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse bada airport kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: King Fahd International Airport, Saudi Arabia duniya ka sabse bada airport hai.

responses.input: Duniya ka sabse bada artificial island kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Flevopolder, Netherlands duniya ka sabse bada artificial island hai.

responses.input: Bharat ka sabse bada IT hub kaunsa hai?
responses.reply: Bengaluru Bharat ka sabse bada IT hub maana jata hai.
ğŸ¶ Tum hi ho... Ab tum hi ho... Zindagi ab tum hi ho... Chain bhi, mera dard bhi... Meri aashiqui ab tum hi ho... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Channa mereya mereya... Channa mereya mereya... O piya... Maine kiya hai tera intezar... Tu jo gaya to mera kya hai asar... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Kesariya tera ishq hai piya... Rang jaoon jo main haath lagaa... Mehka mehka sa yeh samaa... Tu noor hai, tu hi hai sukoon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Shayad kabhi na keh sakoon main tumko... Kahe bina samajh lo tum shayad... Shayad mere khayal mein tum ek din milo... Jaise bina baadal barish... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tera ban jaunga... Jo tu mera ho gaya... Tere bin jeena mumkin nahi... Na dena kabhi mujhko tu faasle... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Raataan lambiyan lambiyan re... Kate tere sangeyaan sangeyaan re... Dil jaane na, mohe kya ho gaya... Teri yaadon mein kho gaya... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Jeene laga hoon... Pehle se zyada... Pehle se zyada... Tum pe marne laga hoon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ O re piya... Haaye... O re piya... Mann ki maaya le ja re... Le chal saath mere... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tum mile to mil gaya yeh jahaan... Tum mile to khil gaya hai samaa... Tum mile to jeene laga hoon main... Tum mile to muskurana aaya... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Agar tum saath ho... Bechaini si bechaini hai... Zindagi me saara dukh ab jaane do... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Dil ibadat kar raha hai... Dhadkanen meri sun zara... Tujhko chahoon betahasha... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Sanam re... Sanam re... Tu mera sanam hua re... Tere bina adhoora jee raha hoon main... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Ek dil ek jaan hai... Dono tujh pe kurbaan hai... Ishq ki saari rahatein, maine tujh mein paa li... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tera hone laga hoon... Khone laga hoon... Jabse mila hoon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Main rang sharbaton ka... Tu meethe ghat ka pani... Mujhe khud mein ghola kar... Tere alawa kuch na janoon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Sun saathiya mahiya... Barsaa de ishqa ki syahiyaan... Rang jaayein... Jo tere rang mein... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tera zikr hai... Ya hai khushboo hai... Jo hawaon mein hai... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Mast magan mast magan... Bas tera naam dohraaye... Koi junoon hai mera... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Janam janam saath chalna yunhi... Kasam tumhe kasam aake milna yahin... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Bol na halke halke... Halke halke bol na... Lab pe gili si baat hai... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Kaun tujhe yun pyaar karega... Jaise main karta hoon... Tujhpe jaan bhi de doon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Galliyan galliyan... Teri galliyan... Mujhko bhaave... Aa tujhme bas jaaun main... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Pee loon... Tere neele neele naino se... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Ae dil hai mushkil... Yeh raatein yeh mausam... ğŸ¶

responses.input: Sun Raha Hai Na Tu song
responses.reply: ğŸ¶ Sun raha hai na tu... Ro rahi hoon main... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Bekhayali mein bhi tera hi khayal aaye... Kyun bichadna hai zaroori, yeh sawaal aaye... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Hasi ban gaye... Hasi ban gaye... Tum mere aasmaan meri zameen ban gaye... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tere sang yaara... Khush rang bahara... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Lag ja gale ke phir ye haseen raat ho na ho... Shaayad phir is janam mein mulaqat ho na ho... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tum jo aaye zindagi mein... Baat ban gayi... Ishq mazhab, ishq meri zaat ban gayi... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tera ban jaunga... Jo tu mera ho gaya... Tere bin jeena mumkin nahi... Na dena kabhi mujhko tu faasle... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Janam janam janam saath chalna yunhi... Kasam tumhe kasam aake milna yahin... Ek jaan hai bhale do badan ho judaa... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Jeene laga hoon... Pehle se zyada... Pehle se zyada... Tum pe marne laga hoon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Tera hone laga hoon... Khone laga hoon... Jabse mila hoon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Main tenu samjhawan ki... Na tere bina lagda jee... Tu ki jaane pyaar mera... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Kaun tujhe yun pyaar karega... Jaise main karta hoon... Tujhpe jaan bhi de doon... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Kaisa yeh raabta... Yeh mere dil ka sukoon hai tu... Har dafa... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Dil dhadakne do... Baatein kehne do... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Dil ibadat kar raha hai... Dhadkanen meri sun zara... Tujhko chahoon betahasha... ğŸ¶
ğŸ¶ Sun saathiya mahiya... Barsaa de ishqa ki syahiyaan... Rang jaayein... Jo tere rang mein... ğŸ¶
